description: '''Sara Elizabeth Mitchell''' (born July 28, 1988), better known by her stage name '''Sirah''' ({{IPAc-en|'|s|aɪ|r|ə}} {{respell|SY|rə}}), is an American rapper and singer from Los Angeles. She collaborated with [[Skrillex]], on "[[Weekends (Skrillex song)|WEEKENDS!!!]]", "[[Kyoto (Skrillex song)|Kyoto]]", and the hit single "[[Bangarang]]".
